DOC.brief_summary: Resistance exercise plus vascular occlusion may induce greater improvements in strength and muscle mass than resistance training alone. The investigators speculate this training strategy could be beneficial in patients with osteoarthritis.
DOC.brief_title: Vascular Occlusion in Patients With Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women BMI <39 Knee Ostearthritis type II and III VAS (visual analogue scale) between 2 and 8 Hip osteoarthritis Use of NSAID
